name: mcp-subregistry
description: Open-source, self-hostable MCP Registry API built on Cloudflare Workers

REGISTRY_ADMIN_SECRET.description: Generate a random string using `openssl rand -hex 32` for admin requests.

REGISTRY_DB.description: The name for your D1 database that supports the registry

CLOUDFLARE_ACCOUNT_ID.description: Your Cloudflare Account ID. Only used for connecting to your D1 with drizzle-kit studio.

CLOUDFLARE_DATABASE_ID.description: Your remote Cloudflare D1 database ID. Only used for connecting to your D1 with drizzle-kit studio.

CLOUDFLARE_D1_TOKEN.description: Your Cloudflare access token with D1 edit permissions. Only used for connecting to your D1 with drizzle-kit studio.
